text.alert_message: This extension allows you to obtain business registration information of companies based on keywords such as company name, registration number, or Unified Social Credit Code, supporting Aliyun Market API

drawer.find_tips_front: Multiple companies found matching the keyword '
drawer.find_tips_end: '. Please select the most appropriate company to write into the multidimensional table.

labels.help_appcode: Please obtain the AppCode according to the extension documentation and paste it here
labels.help_select: Support using company name, registration number, and Unified Social Credit Code as keywords to obtain related company business registration information

placeholder.field: Please select the field where the company information keywords are located
placeholder.apiurl: Normally this does not need to be changed
placeholder.output_company_name: Please select the desired field for outputting the company name

error.fetch_error: Request failed, please check if it's a network issue
error.has_error: An error occurred, the current process has been skipped
error.no_selected_output_field: Please select an output field to continue
error.no_selected_input_field: Please select a field containing company information keywords to continue
error.no_checked_output_option: Please select an output option to continue
error.no_appcode: Please paste the AppCode to continue
error.no_selection: Please first select a cell in the Base table on the left
error.type_not_text: Please select a cell under a text-type field

success.finished: Operation completed, please check the base
